subject: Football
Super Bowl
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: The Colts’ Super Bowl record-tying touchdown drive was propelled by their rushing attack, which finished the regular season ranked last in the N.F.L. at 80.9 yards a game.
snippet: The Colts’ Super Bowl record-tying touchdown drive was propelled by their rushing attack, which finished the regular season ranked last in the N.F.L. at 80.9 yards a game.
